article:
This 'list of [[war film]]s and TV specials' that are films and television
series such as Documentaries, TV mini series and drama serials depicting aspects
of historical wars.
categories: Lists of films by genre|War films
Lists of World War II films
headings: [[Anglo-Saxon settlement of Britain|Anglo-Saxon invasion of England]]
